name: Wow Die
description:
Wow Die is a platformer, but when you die your corpse remains there, which will help you complete the level.

If you play on the Web version don't press the Quit button. (It will freeze the game)

Made for Wowie! Game Jam 3.0

Controls 

WASD or Arrow Keys to move

Space to jump

R to restart

F to erase all your bodies
